character_trigger_types.description: A collection of trigger type definitions that specify how character triggers should behave and be displayed in the UI.

description.description: Localized text descriptions for this trigger type's tooltip body.

disallow_in_deployment.description: Disallows the CharacterTrigger from firing during the Deployment phase.

hidden.description: Marks this CharacterTrigger as a hidden one, the trigger won't appear beneath a Character in battle.

id.description: Unique identifier for this CharacterTrigger. To associate with a CardTrigger provide the same id.

is_state_modifier.description: Marks this CharacterTrigger as a state modifier (will make its trigger tooltip and icon blue). The intended usage is for a conditional trigger whose effect granted is conditional and can be undone when the condition no longer holds. Example: OnDeathwish (Vanguard)/OnDeathwishLost

name.description: Localized text for this trigger type's tooltip title.

notification.description: Localized text for this trigger type's notification message.

sprite.description: Identifier to a sprite (Ideally sized 50x50). This sprite will appear in the UI. An atlas_icon with the same id must be provided for use in tooltips.

items.description: A character trigger type definition that specifies how a trigger should be displayed and behave in the game.
